Package org.pragmaticminds.crunch.api2

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ResultStream<EVENT extends Serializable>
    Final stream that contains only events.
    StreamNode<IN,OUT>
    Base interface for the DAG that describes a complete Stream.
    StreamNodeVisitor<T>
    Visitor pattern for StreamNode.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractStreamNode<IN,OUT>
    Base for the implementation of custom Stream Nodes.
    CrunchContext
    This class is used to store the information about cruch streams that are generated.
    Evaluate<IN,EVENT extends Serializable>
    Stream node that represents an evaluation.
    Filter<E>
    Node that represents a filter operation by the given predicate.
    GroupBy<E,KEY>
    Representation fo the Grou
    Linq4jImplementor<T extends MRecord,EVENT extends Serializable>
    Example visitor that is used to transfer a crunch stream into an Enumerable.
    Linq4jImplementor.EvaluationANdHandler<EVENT extends Serializable>  
    Linq4jImplementor.GroupEvaluation<T extends Serializable>  
    ResultHandler<EVENT extends Serializable>
    Final "closing" block of a Crunch Stream.
    Root<OUT>
    This class is the "base" of each Crunch Stream and contains the Source.
